name: CargoAuthenticate
description: Authentication task for the cargo client used for installing Cargo crates distribution
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, feedUrl is required. All other inputs are ignored.

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: Azure Artifacts Feed url.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, workloadIdentityServiceConnection is required. All other inputs are ignored. Not compatible with cargoServiceConnections.

messages.ConfigTomlNotToml: The file you selected to authenticate (%s) is not a valid .toml file.
messages.ConfigTomlDoesNotExist: The config.toml file you selected at %s does not currently exist.
messages.ConfigTomlMissingRegistry: The config.toml file you selected must contain registries table
messages.AuthenticatingThisConfigToml: Adding authentication for registry listed in this config.toml file at %s
messages.AddingAuthRegistry: Adding auth for registry: %s with token name: %s
messages.AddingAuthExternalRegistry: Adding auth for external registry: %s with token name: %s
messages.ConnectionAlreadySet: %s registry is already set for an %s connection
messages.AuthTelemetry: Authenticated %s internal feeds, %s external repos, and %s federated service connections
messages.FailedToGetServiceConnectionAuth: Unable to get federated credentials from service connection: %s.
